{% extends "templates/item_page.html" %} {% set namespaces = "cmoon" %} {% set library_name = "Concepts" %} {% set item_name = "specialization_of" %} {% block nested %}../{% endblock %} {% block content2 %} {{macros.defined("cmoon.concepts", github_url_src + "/concepts/concepts.ixx")}} {{macros.overload_set([ " template class Template> concept specialization_of = cmoon::is_specialization_v; " ])}}

The concept specialization_of<T, Template> is satisfied if and only if the complete type T is a template specialization of the incomplete type Template.

For example, std::string is a specialization of std::basic_string.

{% endblock %}
